# Insightful Damage (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 3]], [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 7th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 7]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a small silver owl \[v. 10 gp])

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Caster

**Duration:** 1 minute/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

Enchants a crossbow or one handed melee weapon to permit the use of the caster's Intelligence modifier for damage rolls, if it is the only weapon equipped. This spell dispels *[[Insightful Strikes (Spell)|insightful strikes]]*, but as a personal item enchantment it can be used alongside other general temporary item enchantments.

**GM Note**

*Spell Secret:* A successful [[Spellcraft (Skill)|Spellcraft]] check (DC 25) allows the caster to add this spell to another personal item enchantment.
